chain_id.description: The chain to follow. For more details see https://docs.starknet.io/documentation/architecture_and_concepts/Blocks/transactions/#chain-id.

max_events_chunk_size.description: Maximum chunk size supported by the node in get_events requests.

max_events_keys.description: Maximum number of keys supported by the node in get_events requests.

server_address.description: IP:PORT of the node`s JSON-RPC server.
